about_the_game:
karaoke Love Song is a unique karaoke game where you can sing your favorite tracks, create personalized music videos, and share your performances live with the world. With a wide selection of love songs, from timeless classics to modern hits, this game is perfect for music lovers and those who want to express their emotions through singing.

Key Features:

  • A diverse catalog of love songs: Sing heartwarming ballads or the latest romantic hits with a constantly growing playlist.

  • Create music videos: Record and customize your performances by adding unique visual effects, then share them directly on your favorite social media platforms or streaming services.

  • Streamer Mode: Easily connect to Twitch or YouTube and captivate your audience with live performances.

  • Dance to the songs: Based on user votes and wishlist requests, discover new dances added to the game as part of our roadmap. Players can directly influence future content updates with our wishlist system.

  • Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger: Push your karaoke skills to the limit with new challenge modes designed to test your singing abilities. Complete more difficult songs, sing with greater precision, and perform under pressure to earn special rewards. Track your progress and get stronger as you go, unlocking faster-paced challenges and better scoring systems.

  • Become a Legend: Stand out from the crowd by turning your best performances into iconic concert experiences. Earn the "Star of the Concert" badge by impressing the community, and rise to legend status within the game. Show off your star power and become a true karaoke icon!

  • Play solo or duet: Whether you prefer singing alone or teaming up with a friend for a duet, get ready to create unforgettable memories.

Follow the Roadmap

The Love Song roadmap is shaped by the players! Depending on the songs added to the wishlist and community feedback, new dance modes, gameplay improvements, and even more songs will be added in each update. You have the power to influence the future of the game!

Grab your microphone, set the mood, and become the star of your own romantic music journey—maybe even a legend!
